title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.19 - Town of Clay
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8131.19 - Town of Clay

State Regulations
(a) CR 47 (Morgan

Road). CR 47 (Morgan Road) between Commerce Boulevard and Steelway

Boulevard. (b) Steelway Boulevard
between Morgan Road and Carrols Corporation terminal. (c) Henry Clay Boulevard between Vine Street
and Dey Road in the Town of Clay; provided, however, that this route shall only
be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m. and from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all day Saturday and Sunday. (d) Crossroads Park Drive from Henry Clay

Boulevard to its dead end in the Town of Clay. (e) Dey Road from Henry Clay Boulevard to its
dead end in the Town of Clay. (f) Henry Clay Boulevard between Dey Road and Route 31 in the Town of Clay; provided, however, that this route shall only be used from 9 a.m. to 3 p.m., and 6 p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday, and is designated as an access
highway for use by trailers up to 48 feet long and 102 inches wide, and is not
hereby designated as an access highway for tandem trailers. (g) [Repealed]
(h) Edgecomb Drive between Dey Road and its
dead end. (i) Oswego Road (old

Route 57) between John Glenn Boulevard and the Wegmans store at 7418 Oswego

Road. (j) Buckley Road between

Henry Clay Boulevard and the Carrier Warehouse; provided, however, that this
route shall only be used between the hours of 9 a.m. and 3 p.m., and from 6
p.m. to 6 a.m., Monday through Friday. Use of this route will be permitted all
day on Saturday and Sunday. (k) CR
46 (Morgan Road) between Route 31 and CR 46 (Buckley Road). (l) CR 47. CR 47 (Morgan Road) between CR 46
(Buckley Road) and CR 88 (Commerce Boulevard). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8131.19

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
